Entries.Biography:
Kiarra Legame is a freelance graphic designer living in Ridgeside Village. She is the youngest of the Legame siblings and lives on the second floor of Heaps Convenience Store with her brothers Anton and Lorenzo, and Lorenzo's wife Shanice. Kiarra is rebellious and outspoken in her beliefs, including a strong distaste for Joja Co. She is one of twenty-two characters available to marry.

**Background:**

Kiarra is designed to be Italian, and she sometimes uses Italian words in her speech. As a freelance graphic designer, her work schedule is flexible, which allows her to use her free time to help Lenny at the Village Admin office and Paula at the clinic.

Anton.Heading: Anton
Anton.Description: Kiarra's older brother. They live together on the second floor of Heaps Convenience Store and get along well.

Lorenzo.Heading: Lorenzo
Lorenzo.Description: Kiarra's older brother. Lorenzo often worries for his little sister's future and does not always understand her dedication to her righteous beliefs. They live together on the second floor of Heaps Convenience Store.

Shanice.Heading: Shanice
Shanice.Description: Lorenzo's wife. Kiarra gets along well with her, and all four of them live together on the second floor of Heaps Convenience Store.

Lenny.Heading: Lenny
Lenny.Description: Kiarra often uses her free time to help Lenny at the Village Admin office.

Paula.Heading: Paula
Paula.Description: Kiarra often uses her free time to help Paula at the clinic.

Rebellious and Outspoken.Heading: Rebellious and Outspoken
Rebellious and Outspoken.Description: Kiarra is rebellious and outspoken in her beliefs. She has a strong distaste for Joja Co. and will reject marriage proposals from anyone who has completed the Joja Warehouse.

Community Helper.Heading: Community Helper
Community Helper.Description: Since her work is freelance and she does not have to adhere to a strict schedule, Kiarra will often use her free time to help out Lenny and Paula at their respective offices.

Italian Heritage.Heading: Italian Heritage
Italian Heritage.Description: Kiarra and her siblings are designed to be Italian. She sometimes uses Italian words in her speech.

Gifts.Heading: Gifts
Gifts.Description: Kiarra's favorite gifts include Spaghetti, Super Meal, Jumpy Coffee Cake, Desert Tangelo, and Summer Mountain Blessing. She dislikes Hops and hates Mango.

Entries.BiographyEnd:
**Life in Ridgeside Village:**

Kiarra spends her days working on graphic design projects from home. Her typical schedule includes visiting The Ridge, spending time at Heaps Convenience Store, eating at Pika's Restaurant, and relaxing in the Log Cabin Hotel lobby. On Tuesdays she visits the Ridgeside Village Admin office, and on Fridays she goes to the Ridgeside Clinic. During rainy days, she stays on the second floor of Heaps Convenience Store.

Kiarra will send the recipe for Jumpy Coffee Cake after reaching 8 hearts with her.
